title: Igor's Profile
lead: Igor Lemeshkin is a product designer focused on clarity, precision, and real impact.

sections.title: What he does
lines: He creates sharp interfaces, streamlined systems, and intuitive interactions — always grounded in real workflows, not trends.
He breaks down complexity, aligns tightly with development, and builds scalable solutions that last.

checklist.title: Seamless handoffs
checklist.description: Zero friction from concept to code

sections.title: But that's not all
lines: Let's not pretend Igor stops at design — he also codes. For example, he built this very website, including these neatly crafted cards.
However, in the grand scheme of things, labels don't matter. Automation is creeping into every field, and the real game is staying relevant.
Igor calls himself a designer because his edge comes from sharp, distinctly human decisions, rooted in rich multidisciplinary experience. That genuine product vision will always be hard to replicate.

facts.title: Dive really deep
facts.text: Think as a user. Imagine you are them, what they are inspired from and what they are tired of.

sections.title: Not Your Average Origin Story
lines: Igor didn't follow a straight path. Explore the moments that defined his journey — one guess at a time.

sections.title: Side Quest Certified
lines: Igor is always chasing new hobbies. But no matter where he wanders, he always circles back to his first love: design.
And yes, every side quest adds a little something extra to the way he does it.
